per_frame_1=wave_a = 0;
per_frame_2=q1 = time*250;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=q2 = 0.5 + 0.500*( 0.60*sin(0.823*time) + 0.40*sin(0.916*time) );
per_frame_5=q3 = 0.5 + 0.500*( 0.60*sin(0.900*time) + 0.40*sin(1.023*time) );
per_frame_6=q4 = 0.5 + 0.500*( 0.60*sin(0.808*time) + 0.40*sin(0.949*time) );
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=q5 = 0.5-q2;
per_frame_9=q6 = 0.5-q3;
per_frame_10=q7 = 0.5-q4;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=` float2 bg = (uv-0.5)*texsize.xy;
warp_4=` float bg1 = saturate((abs(bg.x)+abs(bg.y)+q1)%64-32);
warp_5=` float bg2 = saturate((-abs(bg.x)-abs(bg.y)+q1)%64-32);
warp_6=` float fnord;
warp_7=` if(length(bg)> 0.25*texsize.y){
warp_8=`  fnord = bg2;
warp_9=` }else{
warp_10=`  fnord = bg1;
warp_11=` }
warp_12=`
warp_13=` ret = lerp(_qa.yzw,_qb,fnord);
warp_14=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*6;
comp_4=`    float3 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_5=`    float3 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_6=`    float2 uv_y = uv-float2(dx.y,dy.y)*0.6;
comp_7=`    float2 uv_x = uv+float2(dx.x,dy.x)*0.2;
comp_8=`
comp_9=`ret = lerp(float3(0.4,0.5,1)*max(0,1-length((uv_y-0.5)*aspect.xy)*3 -0.2+GetPixel(uv).z)
comp_10=`           + GetPixel(uv).x,
comp_11=`           lerp(float3(2,2,1),float3(2,-1,-2),GetPixel(uv).z), GetBlur1(uv_x).y*0.35);
comp_12=`//ret =  GetPixel(uv);
comp_13=`}
comp_14=`
